SEARCH
Package com.syncura360.service

Class RoomService

java.lang.Object
com.syncura360.service.RoomService
@Service public class RoomService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing room-related operations in the hospital. Handles room creation, updating, deletion, and fetching.

YourName

  • Constructor Details

    • RoomService

      public RoomService(RoomRepository roomRepository, BedRepository bedRepository, EquipmentRepository equipmentRepository, BedService bedService, EquipmentService equipmentService)
      Constructor for initializing RoomService with required dependencies. Uses constructor injection for necessary components.
      Parameters:
      roomRepository - The repository used for room operations.
      bedRepository - The repository used for bed operations.
      equipmentRepository - The repository used for equipment operations.
      bedService - The service for bed operations.
      equipmentService - The service for equipment operations.

  • Method Details

    • createRoom

      @Transactional public void createRoom(int hospitalId, RoomFormDTO roomFormDTO)
      Creates a new room in the hospital, along with associated beds and equipment.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The hospital ID to associate the room with.
      roomFormDTO - The data transfer object containing the room's details.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityExistsException - If the room with the given name already exists.

    • updateRoom

      @Transactional public void updateRoom(int hospitalId, RoomUpdateDTO roomUpdateDTO)
      Updates the details of an existing room, including beds and equipment.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The hospital ID to associate the room with.
      roomUpdateDTO - The data transfer object containing the updated room details.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If the room with the given name does not exist.

    • deleteRoom

      @Transactional public void deleteRoom(int hospitalId, RoomDeletionDTO roomDeletionDTO)
      Deletes an existing room and its associated beds and equipment.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The hospital ID to associate the room with.
      roomDeletionDTO - The data transfer object containing the room name for deletion.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If the room with the given name does not exist.
      IllegalArgumentException - If there are occupied beds in the room.

    • fetchRooms

      public List<RoomFetchDTO> fetchRooms(int hospitalId)
      Fetches a list of rooms in the specified hospital.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The hospital ID to fetch rooms for.
      Returns:
      A list of RoomFetchDTO containing room details.

    • fetchRoom

      public RoomFetchDTO fetchRoom(int hospitalId, RoomFetchRequestDTO roomFetchRequestDTO)
      Fetches the details of a specific room by its name in the specified hospital.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The hospital ID to fetch the room for.
      roomFetchRequestDTO - The data transfer object containing the room name.
      Returns:
      A RoomFetchDTO containing room details.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If the room with the given name does not exist.
